named-query.name: findWeaponByName
named-query.query: select w from WeaponEntity w where lower(w.name) = lower(:name)

named-query.name: findRaceByName
named-query.query: select r from RaceEntity r where lower(r.name) = lower(:name)

named-query.name: findClassByName
named-query.query: select c from ClassEntity c where lower(c.name) = lower(:name)

named-query.name: findClassByParentId
named-query.query: select c from ClassEntity c where c.parent.id = :parentId
